original_text: Saul replied, “You are not able to go out against this Philistine and fight him; you are only a young man, and he has been a warrior from his youth.”
korean_text: 사울이 다윗에게 이르되 네가 가서 저 블레셋 사람과 싸울 수 없으리니 너는 소년이요 그는 어려서부터 용사임이니라

sentences.original_text: You are not able to go out against this Philistine
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이 블레셋 사람과 싸우러 나갈 수 없다

sentences.original_text: you are only a young man
and he has been a warrior from his youth
